jgame

Class BaseGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • jgame.BaseGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Game, GameApplet.GameAppletCore

    public abstract class BaseGame
extends java.lang.Thread
    The main game class for GameLibrary games. This class bridges the gap between the simplicity of GameLibrary and the perils of Swing, allowing game developers to focus on game content instead of display code.

    This class's ultrafast display code has been adapted from Ivo Wetzel's StackOverflow post on the subject. Thanks, Ivo.

    Author:
    William Chargin, Ivo Wetzel

      • setRootContainer

        public void setRootContainer(GRootContainer rootContainer)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                             java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets the root container. This method must be invoked prior to startGame().
        Parameters:
        rootContainer - the new root container
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if rootContainer is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the game has already started

        Throws:
